full_summary:
- **Title (English)**: Remedial Excavation Program at PEC Site West Vancouver, B.C.
- **Title (French)**: Programme d'excavation d'assainissement du site de l'Établissement d'aide aux projets environnementaux du Pacifique (EAPP), West Vancouver, BC
- **Reference Number**: WS4046421973
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4046421973
- **Publication Date**: July 10, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, August 4, 2023, 2:00 PM (Local Time)
- **Latest Amendment Date**: July 28, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: Thursday, August 11, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: Indefinite
- **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
- **Tender Status (French)**: Expired
- **Good(s) or Service(s) Procured**: Earthmoving Services, Environmental Services
- **Procurement Category**: Contracted Services (CNST)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: Subject to Canada's Free Trade Agreements with Panama, European Union, Pacific Alliance, Ukraine, Colombia, Chile, South Korea, Latin American and Caribbean countries, members of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and UK.
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada, British Columbia
- **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia, Canada
- **Contracting Entity Name (English)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address (English)**: 11 Laurier St, Phase 3, Place du Portage, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5
- **Contracting Entity Name (French)**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
- **Contact Person**: Fung, Donna (Department of Public Works and Government Services/PSPC)
- **Contact Information**: donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Description
The solicitation is a Phase 2 invitation to bid on a remedial excavation program to be executed at the PEC Site in West Vancouver, BC. Only qualified suppliers who have received an Invitation to Qualify have been invited to submit bids.
